Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Directs the president of the state civil service commission to conduct a study on job vacancies across state agencies
Summary: Directs the president of the state civil service commission to conduct a study on job vacancies across state agencies and determine which, if any, state agencies are understaffed.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to directing the president of the state civil service commission to conduct a study on job vacancies across state agencies
